items.title: JSW Energy takes over GE Power’s boiler business in share swap deal
items.description: The deal will be a share-swap arrangement that will see GEPIL demerge its boiler manufacturing facility in Durgapur to JSW Energy, and the JSW entity will issue 10 equity shares for every 139 shares held by GEPIL shareholders.

items.title: OPINION | India's Corporate Financing Shift: From bank loans to bonds
items.description: India's corporate financing has evolved from bank loans to a competitive blend of equity and corporate bonds. Q1 FY25 saw a record bond issuance, signaling growing entrepreneurial ambition

items.title: Saatvik Green Energy IPO: A shining bet on India’s clean energy future?
items.description: The solar PV module industry faces the risk of  market oversupply and intense price competition

items.title: Weekly Tactical Pick – A good time to add this high-growth housing finance player?
items.description: Business moats, cost tailwinds, and strong execution capabilities will drive valuation

items.title: OPINION | India Inc’s financial metrics are world-class. Leverage it to dominate global markets
items.description: We are at an inflection point. India Inc is more profitable than ever, more resilient than ever, and more ambitious than ever. But national dominance is no longer enough. The time for global ambition is now

items.title: SoftBank Vision Fund to lay off 20% of employees in shift to bold AI bets, source and memo say
items.description: The cuts mark the third round of layoffs at the Japanese investment conglomerate’s flagship fund since 2022.

items.title: Advent International sells 8.9% stake in Cohance Lifesciences for Rs 3,094 crore
items.description: US-based Advent International, through its arm Jusmiral Holdings, which is also the promoter of Cohance Lifesciences, offloaded 3,41,48,000 shares representing an 8.92 per cent stake in the company

items.title: Fire at subsidiary unit temporarily hits production: Aurobindo Pharma
items.description: 'Necessary steps have been initiated for refurbishment and restoration, and we expect the impacted areas to be operational within the next few weeks,'Aurobindo Pharma noted
